name: Spring into Okta
description: Spring Boot and Spring Security connected to Okta with custom login and registration screen

OKTA_API_URL.description: the fully qualified url to your okta tenant

OKTA_API_TOKEN.description: The Okta API token you created for use with this app

OKTA_REDIRECT_URI.description: The full fully qualified url to the resultant (secure) pdf to serve after login

SECURITY_OAUTH2_CLIENT_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Okta OIDC application client id

SECURITY_OAUTH2_CLIENT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Okta OIDC application client secret

SECURITY_OAUTH2_CLIENT_ACCESS_TOKEN_URI.description: The token uri found by following your Okta Authorization Server metadata uri

SECURITY_OAUTH2_CLIENT_USER_AUTHORIZATIO.description: The user authorization uri found by following your Okta Authorization Server metadata uri

SECURITY_OAUTH2_RESOURCE_USER_INFO_URI.description: The user info uri found by following your Okta Authorization Server metadata uri (with /.well-known/openid-configuration)
